directions: Beat shortening with an electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy. Beat in 2 cups powdered sugar. Beat in 1/4 cup rice milk and vanilla extract. Beat in remaining powdered sugar and food coloring. Beat in more rice milk, 1 tablespoon at a time, as needed to achieve a spreadable consistency.
ingredients: ⅓ cup organic all-vegetable shortening (such as Spectrum® Naturals)
¼ cup rice milk, or more as needed
title: Fantastic Frosting (Dairy Free and Soy Free)
